HateSpeech_2.0.TEXT:
"Israel is building a massive wall, deporting Africans, refusing Syrian refugees. Yet the neocons support open borders for USA & Europe."
".@roseperson Interesting how jews hate Whites and they hate Christians, and they constantly agitate to seize their guns."
"@normangoldman I love how brave liberals are when a wacko shoots a couple people. But when a Muslim blows up a hundred or so there's nothing"
"When you're dealing with ghetto witnesses you have to assume most will lie except for a handful that accidentally slip the truth."
"@CNN : I'm a Christian and I totally believe that homosexuality is wrong. God created man & woman. Naturally, opposite attracts, same repels"
"#4thPrecinctShutDown Time to end welfare. All sense of civil behavior and manners has been lost."
"Can't wait to here all about how these scumbags were an \"aspiring hip-hop artist,\" or \"football standout\" or \"goin to skoo\" #AmandaBlackburn"
"mainstream cis gay rights spread idea that gay life isn't trans life. wrong. queer = gender outlaw, until the false option of normalcy"
"Dindus are horrible at civilization. Hell, they can't even handle being parasitical off another civilization w/o killing off their hosts."
"Lebanon was a Christian country. They allowed Muslim refugees in, they soon demanded things and took over Lebanon"
